summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.

Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is higher than any other categories with value 25.1, followed by Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany), and Johanna Quandt (BMW Germany). Down to category Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) with the lowest value of 4.3.
The highest value at Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is almost 5.84 times larger than the minimum value of Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
